## NgxPrimerAccordionRootComponent.updateDisableState() method

Updates the disable state of the specified value(s).

If the value is currently disabled, it will be enabled. If the value is currently enabled, it will be disabled.


**Signature:**

```typescript
protected updateDisableState(value: T | T[], enable: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

value


</td><td>

T \| T\[\]


</td><td>

The value or array of values to update.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

enable


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

A flag indicating whether to enable (true) or disable (false) the value(s).


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void
